profile_summary:
Dynamic Software Engineer with over 13 years of extensive experience in software engineering and full-stack development, possessing strong problem-solving abilities and excellent communication skills, essential for customer support and technical training. Adept at collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to deliver high-performance applications. Proficient in delivering solutions using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in cloud deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines to enhance operational efficiency.
Specializing in creating AI/ML-powered platforms that offer predictive analytics and real-time processing, with skills in MLOps tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Background in compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, brings a strong foundation in math and science, enhancing technical training and presentation skills.
